```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(datos)
library(dplyr)
library(datasets)
```


```{r}
autos <- datasets::mtcars
```


```{r}
Autos_con_filtros <- mtcars |> 
  filter(hp > 100)
```

```{r}
autos_ordenados <- Autos_con_filtros |> 
  arrange(desc(hp))
```

```{r}
autos_seleccion <- autos_ordenados |> 
  select(mpg, hp, wt)
```
